channel.title: The Wealth of Nations Simplified on Superphysics
channel.description: Recent content in The Wealth of Nations Simplified on Superphysics

item.title: Simplification Notes
item.description: Past and present tenses are used as if the current date is February 1773 for Book 1, January 1775 for Book 5, and year is 1784 for the rest of the books. Whenever possible, the actual year (e.g. 1350) is used instead of the regnal year (e.g. 25th of Edward 3rd). Quotes in green text are profound statements by Adam Smith Quotes in bold green text are maxims or very important ideas.
